model.description: Model types: anycalib_pinhole (perspective only), anycalib_gen (general images), anycalib_dist (distorted images), anycalib_edit (edited images)

camera.description: Camera model options: pinhole, simple_pinhole, radial:k (k=1-4), simple_radial:k, kb:k (k=1-4), simple_kb:k, ucm, simple_ucm, eucm, simple_eucm, division:k, simple_division:k

input.description: Input image settings. image_pattern uses {} as placeholder for index.
